MaxTrackedTimeSinceLockerOrRemnantExit.Description: How long is the event for killer exiting locker or teleporting to remnant tracked for score event

K28Power_PowerChargeTime_InitialChargeTi.Description: The initial charge time it will take for the power to charge at the start of the match

K28Power_PowerChargeTime_DayCycle.Description: The time it takes for the K28Power to fully charge from a depleted state when in the day time.

K28Power_PowerChargeTime_NightCycle.Description: The time it takes for the K28Power to fully charge from a depleted state when in the night time.

K28Power_ChargedState_NumberOfTokens.Description: The number of tokens the K28 Power will have when the power gets fully charged.

DayNight_NightCharging_RequiredChargesFo.Description: The number of charges required for the night timer for it to be fully charged and the DayNightCycle to transition to the start of the night cycle.

DayNight_NightCharging_ChargeAmount_Kill.Description: The amount added per seconds to the night charge timer when the killer is currently hiding in a locker.

DayNight_NightCharging_ChargeAmount_Inju.Description: The charge amount per second that is added to the night charge timer PER survivors currently injured in the match.

DayNight_NightCharging_ChargeAmount_Defa.Description: The default charge amount per second that is added to the night charge timer.

DayNight_NightCharging_ChargeAmount_Game.Description: The charge amount that is added to the night charge timer when the killer injures a survivor with a basic attack.
The charge amount that is added to the night charge timer when a survivor hooked game event is triggered.

DayNight_NightCharging_ChargeAmount_Kill.Description: The charge amount that is added to the night charge timer the killer teleports to the Remnant

DayNight_NightCharging_NearingActivation.Description: The percent of RequiredChargesForCompletion that needs to be reached for Night to be considered to be "Nearing Activation"

DayNight_NightDischarging_ReachedNearEnd.Description: The percent of oh night cycle discharge needs to reach to enter the near end state (music will change)

DayNight_NightDischarging_RequiredCharge.Description: The total number of charges required for the night to be completely discharged, bringing back the day/night cycle back to the start of the day cycle.

DayNight_NightDischarging_BaseDischargeR.Description: The base discharge rate per seconds that is being removed from the night cycle time.

DayNight_NightDischarging_SurvivorInLock.Description: The discharge rate added to the base discharge rate per survivors hiding in lockers during the night time.

DayNight_NightTransitionTime.Description: The amount of seconds it takes to transition to Night after the amount of charges has been reached

DayNight_DayTransitionTime.Description: The amount of seconds it takes to transition to Day after the amount of charges has been reached

DayNight_SurvivorSeeOtherSurvivorVFXMini.Description: The minimum distance away another survivor must be from the locally controlled survivor to see the Night VFX on that survivor.

DayNight_SurvivorSeeOtherSurvivorVFXMaxi.Description: The maximum distance away another survivor can be from the locally controlled survivor to see the Night VFX on that survivor.

DayNight_KillerSeeSurvivorVFXMinimumDist.Description: The minimum distance away a survivor must be from the locally observed killer to see the Night VFX on them

DayNight_KillerSeeSurvivorVFXMaximumDist.Description: The maximum distance away a survivor can be from the locally observed killer to see the Night VFX on them

DayNight_NightCycle_VisibilityMaximumDis.Description: The maximum distance away a survivor or killer can be seen from another survivor when in the night cycle.

DayNight_DarknessRadiusDistance.Description: The distance of the darkness radius.

DayNight_Killer_OtherPlayerMaxViewDistan.Description: The killer player's max view distance of other players in the darkness.

DayNight_Survivor_OtherPlayerMaxViewDist.Description: The killer player's max view distance of other players in the darkness.

DayNight_Killer_BlackMaterialMinDistance.Description: The minimum distance the survivor is from the killer for the killer to have a black material applied to him to make him almost invisible in the darkness.

TeleportInteraction_ChargeTime.Description: The time it takes to charge up the teleport power, and be able to teleport to a locker or husk.

TeleportInteraction_Speed_DayCycle.Description: The speed at which the killer teleports to its target during the day time.

TeleportInteraction_Speed_NightCycle.Description: The speed at which the killer teleports to its target during the night time.

TeleportInteraction_RemnantFadeInTime.Description: The time the fade in will take when teleporting to the K28Remnant

TeleportInteraction_RemnantFadeOutTime.Description: The time the fade out will take when the teleportation has bee completed

TeleportInteraction_SurvivorGrab_Duratio.Description: The duration of the teleport transition when a survivor is currently hiding in a locker and will get grabbed by the killer.

TeleportInteraction_MinDistanceFromHooke.Description: The minimum distance required for the locker to be from a hooked survivor for the locker cluster to be available teleportation target.

TeleportInteraction_MinDistanceFromLocke.Description: The Minimum distance the killer requires to be from the locker for the locker to be an eligible locker cluster

ExitLockedLockerInteraction_Time.Description: The amount of seconds it takes the killer to exit a locked locker

Locker_FOV.Description: The target field of view when the killer is in a locker.

Locker_KillerInstinctRadius.Description: The radius in which K28 can see a survivor from when he is in a Locker during Night

Locker_TimeToTriggerWarningReveal.Description: How long the killer can stay inside a locker before triggering the warning reveal fx

Locker_KillerInstinctLingerDuration.Description: How long the killer instinct remains active when its conditions are no longer true

Locker_PreventSearchInteractionTime.Description: The time the search interactions will be removed from the killer
